mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICENUM, N.CATEGORY, N.TITLE, E.NAME, N.MODDATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (N.EMPLOYEENUM=E.EMPLOYEENUM) ORDER BY N.NOTICENUM DESC LIMIT 0,6

SELECT S.MONTHNUM, COUNT(M.MEMBERNUM) TOTAL FROM MONTHS S LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE SUBSTRING(JOINDATE, 1, 4) = SUBSTRING(NOW(), 1, 4))M ON (M.JOINMONTH = S.MONTHNUM) GROUP BY S.MONTHNUM ORDER BY S.MONTHNUM ASC
SELECT CATEGORY, TITLE, STATE, REGDATE FROM APPROVAL WHERE EMPLOYEENUM = #{employeeNum} ORDER BY APPROVALNUM DESC LIMIT 0,6
